programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates when an Islamic terrorist group in Iraq steals a truck with $5million and track the money back to America. The agents learn the cash has been used to set up a bank robbery intended as a ruse to allow a bank employee to transfer $100million of the terrorists' money that has been frozen by the government in an offshore bank. Crime drama, starring Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Calvin Lee, an executive naval officer, appears to commit suicide by hanging himself from a public road bridge. When examining CCTV footage of the incident, Sam and Callen discover the dead man tossed away a small object before jumping to his death, and when they learn the late lieutenant commander had been working on a sensitive project involving new cloaking technology for submarines, they immediately take an interest in the item. The investigation draws the team into the furtive world of LA's Chinese community, where they discover Lee might have been harbouring some personal as well as professional secrets. Crime drama, starring Chris O'Donnell.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A naval officer involved in an illegal underground street race is killed when his vehicle explodes. The team's investigations reveal he was carrying classified equipment in relation to his work on a new form of battery that the military had hoped to adopt, and that the explosion - captured on CCTV - is not in accordance with that expected of normal fuel. Meanwhile, Callen latest driving misdemeanour means he must attend traffic school. Chris O'Donnell stars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Marine gunnery sergeant Wendell Dobbs is gunned down in a drive-by shooting by assailants wielding AK-47s, and the team suspects the victim may have been involved in illegally importing automatic weapons into the country and supplying them to local gangs. Sam goes undercover to find the truth after learning Dobbs gave up his combat post to mentor his younger brother, who had been hanging out with a gang. Crime drama, starring Chris O'Donnell.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Marine Daniel Zuna is found dead in a pool of his own blood in an alleyway outside a night club, and the team's first stop is to investigate the mixed martial arts gym where the victim spent most of his off-duty time. Kensi poses as Zuna's new girlfriend and suspects the murder could be related to something that happened in Iraq, prompting Sam to go undercover as an MMA fighter in order to see if he can find out the truth. Crime drama, starring LL Cool J and Daniela Ruah.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt is distraught to learn that his mentor is now an alcoholic reduced to sweeping stables to feed his drinking habit.(n)

programme.title: The High Chaparral
programme.desc: Big John is suffering from exhaustion and the apparent cure is to spend some time away from the ranch. He and Victoria leave on a delayed honeymoon in San Francisco, but things at the ranch don't go too well as Buck, Blue and Manolito struggle to manage it alone.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs discovers a link between the murder of a petty officer and the break-up of his team, leading him and new director Leon Vance to uncover a case of blackmail involving an NCIS agent. The duo single out three suspects, but learn vital information has been stolen, and realise the whole Persian Gulf Fleet could be in danger.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A lieutenant apparently commits suicide by jumping from an aircraft carrier and Ziva and McGee are dispatched to inform the widow - but arrive to find that she has been killed. Subsequent inquiries reveal that the injuries on her body were inflicted after death and the murder scene was carefully staged to mislead investigators. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Cote de Pablo.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs receives a call from his old friend Senator Patrick Kiley, who claims he is being framed for the murder of a naval commander, and seeks help to clear his name. However, incriminating evidence quickly piles up against him - and a second death complicates matters further. Meanwhile, Ziva lets her hair down to obtain fingerprints from a big oil lobbyist. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs revisits his home town to investigate an assault that left one marine dead and another badly injured, and enlists the help of his estranged father to identify the assailant. Suspicion initially falls on a local man whose daughter was dating the survivor of the attack - but later inquiries uncover a tangled tale of uncertain paternity and forbidden love. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Ralph Waite.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A marine is found murdered in his garage, and inquiries lead the agents to his former sergeant. However, Gibbs and the team soon find out that their man is under FBI witness protection as he is about to testify against a mobster, giving him a cast-iron alibi. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Joe Spano.(n)

programme.title: Ultimate Force
programme.desc: A selection exercise involving three gruelling days of combat survival in the Welsh mountains turns into a nightmare for Red Troop when one of the 10 remaining recruits dies. When doctors reveal he has been murdered, Henno mounts a hunt for the killer against police orders. Drama, starring Ross Kemp and Jamie Draven.(n)

programme.title: Ultimate Force
programme.desc: Armed Checkrein terrorists break into a pharmaceutical plant, taking hostages when the alarm is raised and the unit sealed off. Caroline volunteers to enter the premises and treat one of the employees after MI5 reveals the plant is working on a vaccine for a potent anthrax mutation. As time runs out, Red Troop is faced with a dilemma on which the lives of colleagues - and thousands of innocent civilians - depend. Ross Kemp and Alex Reid star.(n)

programme.desc: A Marine Corps officer vows to avenge his sister's murder, and Walker must find him before another life is lost. Adventure, starring Chuck Norris.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Homeland Security employee Victor Sterling mysteriously disappears and his car is found at a drive-through restaurant that becomes the scene of a double murder. programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. programme.desc: Part two of two. programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 312. Pitches in the Season 3 finale include a residential lock system that incorporates a key into a mobile phone; a home gym with nitrogen-gas pressure as resistance; antiaging products inspired by their developer's older girlfriend; and recycled sneakers. Also: an update on a Web site that sells VIP treatment at nightclubs and special events(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 605. Entrepreneurs include the owner of an all-female golf caddy company; a couple who believe they have come up with a better, safer way for kids to bounce; and a trio who pitch to the Sharks their fun spin on a classic faceware accessory. Also: an update on Mark Cuban's $2 million investment in the Los Angeles Haunted Hayride during Season 4(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 726. A heated exchange takes place in the Season 7 finale when a Shark's temper is lost after an entrepreneur refuses an offer "for personal reasons." Other highlights include a line of healthy treats made just for women; a rare second chance to strike a deal; and updates on some viewer favorites(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 715. A Shark declares one pitchperson would drive them nuts. Products include a breath freshener with dual uses; a functional kid's placemat; and an "ugly" produce subscription service. Also: a follow-up on the Houston-based founders of LuminAID solar inflatable lights, which Mark Cuban invested in during Season 6(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 606. The Sharks consider a business idea for affordable wedding cakes brought to them by a mother and son from Grand Rapids, Mich. Also: a Houston restaurateur with a solution to a common problem encountered while dining out; and an update on a screen repair fix-it kit that Lori invested in during Season 5(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 509. A record is broken by one lucky entrepreneur, who accepts an unprecedented amount for a deal, while a producer of Halloween attractions takes some heat for overvaluing her business. Also: a repair wrap from two men in Utah; a product designed to help communicate feelings; and an update on fishing bobbers made from shotgun shells, which Mark invested in during Season 4(n)

programme.desc: Debra clears out all the kids' old baby clothes and gives them to a jumble sale, making Ray realise she is resigned to not having any more children.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Part one of two. Flashback episode in which the Barones recall their courtship and wedding, beginning with Ray's nervous marriage proposal - and subsequent uncertainty over Debra's motive for accepting.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Bebe advises Frasier to feign illness to secure a pay rise and prove he is indispensable, but the station responds by cleaning out his cubicle and auditioning for a replacement. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and Harriet Sansom Harris.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Crane brothers buy into a restaurant, but their conflicting views on everything leave them without a head chef on opening night - and most of the waiters also walk out. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Martin prepares to celebrate his birthday, but an argument between Niles and Frasier over a patient, as well as a city-wide power cut, ensures none of the household is in the mood for a party. Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: In the 200th episode of the comedy, the gang finally celebrates Sheldon's birthday after more than nine years together, with the help of a few special guests. Starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco, with guest appearances from Adam West, Wil Wheaton and Stephen Hawking.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard face problems when they file for a patent for their infinite persistence gyroscope. Plus, Penny, Amy and Bernadette give Raj dating advice when Emily reaches out to him after their breakup. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco star.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer and the family set off for a cheap break in Japan, where they get stranded and find themselves forced to take part in a shocking game show to win tickets for the flight home. Featuring the voice of Star Trek veteran George Takei.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer adopts a new identity and begins calling himself Max Power in a bid to avoid being confused with a bumbling TV cop who shares his real name. With the guest voice of Ed Begley Jr.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: In the first of a two-part edition, Gordon Ramsay heads to La Galleria 33 in Boston, Massachusetts, an Italian restaurant run by sisters Rita and Lisa. The pair grew up working at their father's eatery nearby, but when they opened their own business, they couldn't replicate his success, and they now blame their failure on everything from the weather to the tablecloths.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The first visit of the week is to Newton House in Knaresborough, North Yorkshire, where Denise Carter and Jackie Fennell's traditional B&B focuses on organic, free-range breakfasts. Over dinner, guest Marianne Cammack and Deina Thomas from dominate the conversation, riling up some of the others, while Mike Hayes and Neal Widdowson think the morning meal is all way too fancy.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit of the competition is to The Highlands Pub in Blackpool, where managers Mike Hayes and Neal Widdowson are all about value for money.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants travel to the White House in Brighton for the third day of the competition, where hosts Sean Edlin and Kathryn Turnbull run a laid-back seaside B&B. Denise and Jackie think the rooms are not well equipped and Marianne finds them clinical, while Mike and Neal are unsure about the price. Tensions are temporarily alleviated by a visit to the famous Theatre Royal, but Marianne and Deina continue to cause trouble at dinner. In the morning, a locally sourced breakfast impresses some of the guests, but the group must decide whether they are getting value for money.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Wakes Hall Lodges near Colchester is the fourth and final visit of the week, where Neal and Mike are wowed by the five-star self-catering accommodation, complete with hot tubs and lakeside views. The others aren't so sure about the `luxury' breakfast hamper, however, especially as it means cooking their own. An afternoon of dog agility gives manager Marianne Cammack the chance to demonstrate her authority, although over dinner, her domineering conversation causes Jackie to finally snap.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The B&B owners meet for the last time to find out what they've been paid and to settle some scores. Mike and Neal from the Highlands Pub challenge the comments that they were considered dirty and lacking in facilities, while Sean and Kathryn from the White House are left smarting after suffering large underpayments for what they think are minor issues. Eventually, the winner is finally revealed.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Childhood sweethearts Debbie and Tony Parkes have been married for 40 years, and are ready for a new chapter in their lives. With retirement around the corner, they've set their hearts on a holiday home in Albufeira on Portugal's Algarve with a budget of £80,000.(n)

programme.title: Big House, Little House
programme.desc: Two Huddersfield sisters plan to create high-end student accommodation on a budget of £100,000, while in south-east London, £35,000 turns a two-bedroom terrace into a family home.(n)

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer visit the Alcorn family in Peebles in the Scottish Borders. The family of four lives in a conservation area and while dad Dave loves their grey-stone Victorian villa for its picture-book charm, mum Amy despises its lack of practicality. With no off-road parking, no third bedroom and no downstairs bathroom - not to mention the small, draughty kitchen - she has quite a list. Would it be best to simply move on to one of the new properties picked out by Phil, or can Kirstie come up with a way of making their home work?.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Britain at Low Tide
programme.desc: Tori Herridge and Alex Langlands set out to document Britain's industrial and natural maritime history, using state-of-the-art technology to comb the nation's exposed coastlines during times of low tide. They first head out to the Northumbrian coastline, to investigate the tragic story of a French fishing trawler that was wrecked off shore in 1913.(n)

programme.title: Paul O'Grady's Hollywood
programme.desc: New series. The first of three programmes in which the veteran TV presenter delves into the rich vein of cinematic history to find out what it takes to transform a film into a silver-screen masterpiece capable to standing the test of time. Taking in everything from big production musicals to vehicles for enduring screen heroines, Paul reveals what makes celebrated movies so memorable. He begins with classic `weepies', from the early silent melodramas through to James Cameron's Titanic, and hears from Jon Voight, Bernard Cribbins, Celine Dion and the casts of E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial and Beaches.(n)

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: A retired CIA agent survives an assassination attempt and realises something in his past has made him a target. He sets out to reunite the members of his old hit squad to find out who is trying to kill them and why, but in the process, uncovers dangerous secrets. Action thriller, with Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich and Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: American Reunion
programme.desc: Jim Levenstein and his old friends return to their home town for a high-school reunion. Struck by how much their lives have changed, they set out to relive the sexual misadventures of their adolescence, but only end up making bigger fools of themselves than they did as teenagers. Comedy sequel to the American Pie movies, starring Jason Biggs and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads for Bridgeport, Connecticut, to visit Cafe Tavolini, which is being neglected by husband and wife managers teetering on the edge of divorce. The estranged couple's two children are struggling to save the business from their parents' disputes, and the visiting chef tries to shock the pair into stopping the restaurant from becoming a casualty of their quarrel.(n)

programme.title: The Last Leg
programme.desc: Adam Hills, Josh Widdicombe and Alex Brooker are joined by celebrity guests for a comic review of the significant moments of the past seven days. The trio offer their own unique insight into some of the most difficult and delicate issues in modern Britain, and answer that most important of questions: Is it OK?.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Omnibus. Yasmine goes a step too far with Lily, while Harry turns to alcohol to heal his pain. Elsewhere, Misbah catches Kim and Farrah kissing and pleads with Kim to break up with her daughter, and Scott gets himself a job working with his secret brother, Damon.(n)

programme.title: Selling Houses with Amanda Lamb
programme.desc: Three homeowners in Bristol compete to sell their homes to prospective buyers Jocelyn and Julia. Each would-be seller is given a chance to visit their rivals' abodes, spend £1,000 on improvements, and receive expert refurbishment tips from the host. Father and daughter Tom and Becca rip out their bathroom and smarten up their kitchen, while Michelle ropes in friend Sam to help her update her dining room, and bachelor Ian makes gives his bedroom a more feminine touch.(n)

programme.title: Kirstie's Vintage Gems
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp helps Amber and Colin turn their bedroom into a dream vintage haven. After an initial assessment, the presenter begins by getting rid of any mass-produced furniture.(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: When a new couple move into the neighbourhood, Vanessa invites them over for dinner. Mike is not pleased as he was planning to spend the evening watching sport on TV, but gets a surprise when he meets them. Elsewhere, Mandy plots revenge after catching her boyfriend Travis lying to her. Comedy, starring Tim Allen. Previously shown on E4.(n)

programme.title: Cycling
programme.desc: Action from the event held in the Castellon region of Spain, featuring a 200km course with 6,500m of climbing on the slopes of Mount Penyagolosa, the `Stone Giant' of local myth.(n)

programme.title: Motor Sport on 4
programme.sub-title: Motor Sport: Armoy Road Race Build-Up.
programme.desc: Documentary looking at the history of the annual event held in Armoy, Co Antrim.(n)

programme.title: Motor Sport on 4
programme.desc: Action from the annual event, which was set to feature some of the biggest names in motorcycling as they descended on Armoy, Co Antrim.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The radio station's new manager disagrees with everything Frasier says - and when the shrink objects to her ideas, he finds his show rescheduled at two o'clock in the morning. Comedy, guest starring Mercedes Ruehl, with Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles suggests he and Frasier set up practice together - but after a series of disasters, they end up in need of therapy themselves. Comedy, guest starring Milo O'Shea, with Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce.(n)

programme.title: Sunday Brunch
programme.desc: Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer are joined by guests Blake Harrison, John Gordon Sinclair, Kimberly Wyatt and Evanna Lynch. With music from Rat Boy.(n)

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George travels to the Cornish village of Charlestown, where Charlotte and Joey have bought a public loo that they are planning to turn into a luxury clifftop holiday home - at a cost of £65,000. He also meets a Bristol family who are making their own safari tent, completes his tour of New Zealand with a visit to an underground house, and he and Will Hardie finally unveil their prototype futuristic home.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge tries to bring culture to Springfield by asking architect Frank Gehry (guest starring as himself) to construct a concert hall. However, none of the locals is interested, so Mr Burns decides to turn the disused building into a prison, where Homer soon finds himself confined.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer is committed to a mental institution by an exasperated Marge, who refuses to believe his improbable tales about befriending a mysterious roofing contractor and fears he is finally cracking up. With the guest voices of Ray Romano and Stephen Hawking.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Father, the Son and the Holy Guest Star.
programme.desc: Bart begins attending a Catholic school and meets a hip-hop-quoting priest who encourages him to convert. Homer tries to return his son to the Protestant Church, but the lure of beer and a pancake dinner causes him to change his faith - so Reverend Lovejoy and Ned Flanders take action. With the guest voice of Liam Neeson.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Moe becomes a successful poet with Lisa's help, and wins the approval of a group of highbrow authors - but enjoys the limelight so much that he claims all the credit for himself, prompting her to seek revenge.(n)

programme.title: UEFA Euro 2017 Live
programme.sub-title: UEFA Women's Euro 2017: The Final Live.
programme.desc: Netherlands v Denmark (Kick-off 4.00pm). Coverage of the showpiece match, which takes place at FC Twente Stadion in Enschede, the Netherlands. After three weeks of intense competition, this match will determine who lifts the trophy, which has been won by the Germans for a remarkable five previous tournaments in succession. The host nation progressed to this showpiece match following a 3-0 victory over England in the semi-finals, while Denmark had to rely on a penalty shootout to overcome Austria, following a goalless draw after extra time. Subsequent programmes are subject to change.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: The Mystery of the Crossrail Skulls
programme.desc: Documentary examining the discovery of dozens of Roman-era skulls by engineers working beneath London's Liverpool Street station. The remains have been identified as dating back to Roman times, but it has yet to be determined who these people were and how their heads ended up buried on the site. Archaeologists examine the bones for evidence of the various theories that have been suggested, questioning whether the skulls belonged to gladiators, executed rebels or the victims of a massacre, or formed part of a grisly ritual.(n)

programme.title: Diana: In Her Own Words
programme.desc: Documentary featuring never-before-seen footage of Diana, Princess of Wales, recorded by her speech consultant between 1992 and 1993 as she sought to define her public persona and present her own version of events reported in the press, touching on her marriage and experience of public life. The programme also features in-depth interviews with people close to her.(n)

programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: The younger son of George V struggles to cope with an uncontrollable stammer, prompting his wife to enlist the aid of an eccentric Australian speech therapist. The support and friendship of the doctor prove invaluable when a crisis places the repressed prince on the throne, just as the outbreak of the Second World War leaves the country in need of a strong king. Oscar-winning fact-based drama, starring Colin Firth, Geoffrey Rush, Helena Bonham Carter and Guy Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Poppy Cat
programme.desc: Alma offers to knit jumpers for her friends, but she has run out of wool, meaning the gang must first find some using their hot-air balloon.(n)

programme.desc: The young royal is annoyed she is not allowed on her new swing unless an adult is around to supervise.(n)

programme.desc: Little Miss Whoops causes havoc on board the Dillydale Express.(n)

programme.desc: The inquisitive animal discovers what interesting creatures live underwater and wonders what it would be like to be a monkey fish.(n)

programme.desc: Children's animation about a young rabbit. Simon is playing at being a superhero when a real-life rescue mission suddenly beckons.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Suzy and Peppa decide to work in a shop to be more like adults, but discover it is very tiring.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: The team comes to the aid of a family of deer that is stick on the ice.(n)

programme.desc: The duo grow to human size when a spell goes wrong, allowing them to play with Lucy and her friends.(n)

programme.desc: Animation following the adventures of a dragon and his best friends. Digby feels down on Dragon Day as he cannot yet fly or breathe fire.(n)

programme.desc: The piglet and her family spot a rainbow while out driving.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Pedro gets a cough at play school, and the other children soon catch the virus.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Daisy and Poppy are given a powerful magic wand by Granny Thistle when she comes to stay, and have fun with it when they escape from the castle.(n)

programme.title: Wanda and the Alien
programme.desc: Wanda and Alien go on an adventure to find the end of a rainbow. Fun for younger viewers about a rabbit who is best friends with an extraterrestrial.(n)

programme.title: Chinese Food in Minutes
programme.desc: Two gospel singers learn how to cook up a feast for their choir. Ching-He Huang teaches them recipes for chicken and black bean stir-fry, and sweet and sour ribs.(n)

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.sub-title: Dogs Make You Laugh Out Loud.

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Damien Stevens draws his stun gun on an aggressive driver, while the hunt for a suspected armed robber turns up a nasty surprise for dog handler Jimmy Grieves. Paul Jackson grapples with a man armed with a machete, and officers get kitted up to raid the home of a suspected cannabis grower.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: The series exploring the work of the North-East's high-speed police interception unit continues as Damo Stevens hunts down a heroin dealer, and Jacko rushes to a critical car crash. The interceptors are also called to investigate some potentially hazardous goods, and Kev makes an intriguing discovery in an airing cupboard. Plus, a young driver makes a mistake she may come to regret.(n)

programme.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun
programme.desc: Drag artist James - aka Dusty Crack - wants to update his Amy Winehouse outfit, but money is tight as he has seen his earnings go down from 100 euros a gig to sometimes as little as 30. Paul and Jacqui run a bar that charges significantly more than other local establishments, but attract customers by offering bingo, quiz nights and British food, while retired Middlesbrough couple Eddie and Pauline are living on a strict budget at Villamar, Benidorm's largest campsite, where they regard their pitch opposite the campsite bins as a bonus.(n)

programme.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun
programme.desc: Featuring a `Top Ten Guide to Living in Benidorm on the Cheap', revealing that life as a budget expat is possible for almost any pocket, before catching up with some of the big characters from the season. Scouse singer Eddie, Essex campsite worker Dean and Wigan granny Maria explain where to find super-cheap digs, and how to turn a caravan into a home with all mod cons.(n)

programme.title: The Nightmare Neighbour Next Door
programme.desc: A dispute between households arising from investments made into a business venture that later failed, and the fury surrounding the construction of an extension that saw damage to an adjacent property. Plus, updates on people and stories featured in previous programmes, including the latest whereabouts of rowdy rapper Elvis Turasinze, who drove his neighbours berserk with his beat-making.(n)

programme.title: The Nightmare Neighbour Next Door
programme.desc: A dispute involving a female student and the man living upstairs descends into violence, while Doug and Mavis moved into a new house with their menagerie of animals and were stunned when a neighbour complained about the noise, but that turned out to be just the beginning of their troubles.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Kevin Stokes and Brian O'Shaughnessy get into a doorstep confrontation with a debtor who wants to prove her family business is bankrupt. However, when tempers flare Brian is assaulted and the agents call the police. Elsewhere, Paul Bohill and Steve Pinner face evicting three properties owned by the same landlord in north London, and Brian and Delroy Anglin collect £2,000 debt owed to a vet in Kent.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Agents Paul Bohill and Steve Pinner get caught up in a dispute between a landlord and a tenant who refuses to move out, and Brian O'Shaughnessy and Delroy Anglin chase a £17,000 debt. Meanwhile, in Essex, a couple owe their neighbour £11,000, and on the south coast, debt collection from a Turkish restaurant gets complicated when there is confusion about ownership.(n)

programme.title: Cricket on 5
programme.sub-title: England v South Africa: Fourth Test Day Two.
programme.desc: England v South Africa. Highlights of the second day's play in the final Test of the four-match series, which took place at Old Trafford in Manchester.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Documentary giving an insight into cash-strapped Britain from the perspectives of debtors, creditors and those who collect the payments, including High Court enforcement bailiffs and repossession teams. The series follows each case as it unfolds, recording the thoughts and feelings on both sides, the process of repossession and the impact it has on all involved.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Football on 5: The Championship
programme.desc: Highlights from the latest games in the Championship, which included Sunderland v Derby County at The Stadium of Light, Wolverhampton Wanderers v Middlesbrough at Molineux, and Aston Villa v Hull City at Villa Park.(n)

programme.title: Football on 5: Goal Rush
programme.desc: Goals from the weekend's games in Leagues One and Two, which included Southend United v Blackburn Rovers at Roots Hall, Portsmouth v Rochdale at Fratton Park, and Forest Green Rovers v Barnet at The New Lawn.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: Highlights of the residents' past 24 hours under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, as they try to get used to their housemates' quirks and foibles while also coping with the day-to-day complications of life inside the house.(n)

programme.title: Lip Sync Battle UK
programme.sub-title: Lip Sync Battle UK: Walliams v Dixon.
programme.desc: David Walliams and Alesha Dixon take part in the first edition of this musical game show in which celebrities go head to head lip-synching to a hit song - complete with dance moves, facial expressions and costumes. Presented by former Spice Girl Melanie Brown and her co-host, rapper Professor Green.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: The Royals
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the intricate symbolism and superstitions surrounding royal funerals and how the public's perception of the monarchy can be deeply affected by them. Queen Victoria requested that specific items were placed in her coffin, including a plaster cast of her husband Albert's hand and a picture of her faithful gillie John Brown, while the death of Diana, Princess of Wales, changed the British royal family for ever. Alistair Appleton narrates.(n)

programme.title: The Royals
programme.desc: Documentary looking at some of the incidents involving the royal family that have made media headlines around the world, including the death of Diana, Princess of Wales, in 1997 after her car crashed while being pursued by the paparazzi in Paris. The programme also reflects on the fuss that ensued after the publication of topless pictures of the Duchess of Cambridge sunbathing on holiday, as well as photos of Prince Harry playing strip billiards in Las Vegas. Narrated by Alistair Appleton.(n)

programme.title: Great Artists
programme.desc: Seventeenth-century Dutch painter Jan Vermeer, the lowly son of an innkeeper and art dealer, lived an uneventful life, leaving fewer than 40 authenticated works and dying unknown outside his home town. Tim Marlow investigates how his talent came to be regarded as highly as Rembrandt's, and examines the simple domestic scenes that led to his posthumous rise to fame.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: Building work disturbs a fox's earth, leaving the cubs orphaned, and a duck family is taken to a new home.(n)

programme.title: Chinese Food in Minutes
programme.desc: Two cheesemongers from Borough Market who are dedicated foodies ask Ching-He Huang for help to spice up their kitchen repertoires. On the menu are sea bass steamed in wine, a spicy beef dish and the Chinese classic, hot-and-sour soup.(n)

programme.title: Poppy Cat
programme.desc: Alma finds a lost shoe and wants to keep it, but her friends persuade her to find the owner and return it to them.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.sub-title: I Want to Be a Baby.
programme.desc: The youngster is upset that she is no longer the centre of attention when her baby cousin comes to visit.(n)

programme.title: Mr Men
programme.desc: Superstore worker Mr Tickle delivers a unique greeting to each customer, while Little Miss Daredevil displays some skilful scootering.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey
programme.desc: The cheeky hero takes to the sky to view the city from inside a glass bubble, high above the ground.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Bopping About
programme.desc: Join Jen and Kemi for a super sunny summer boogie with friends as they practise their Sunny Shake. Pre-school live action series exploring music and movement.(n)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Simon is determined to master the art of riding a bike. Animated children's series about an engaging but headstrong young rabbit.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig realises he has kept a library book for too long, so the family returns it and chooses another to read.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: When Otis the oxpecker is grounded by an injured wing, Wissper asks Peggy the pingwing to show him how to have fun without flying.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The team is asked to build a wind farm to power the Sea Life Centre. However, Scoop becomes overambitious and causes damage to some of the turbines. Animated antics with the friendly handyman and his hard-working pals.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: The twins keep fighting over whose birthday party is the best. As the battle intensifies, it is down to Uncle Sam to get them out of a frightening situation.(n)

programme.title: Olly the Little White Van
programme.desc: Two firefighters call in sick, so Royston the Firetruck enlists both Olly and Stan to help with any emergencies.(n)

programme.title: Olly the Little White Van
programme.desc: Albert the Amazing Magician fails to turn up in time to entertain the guests at Charlie's birthday party, so Stan and Olly decide to fill in with a few illusions of their own.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: When Cap'n Turbot and his cousin Francois go deep-sea diving to snap a picture of a rare seaslug, their diving bell ends up getting stuck.(n)

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Starla and Blaze find a map that leads the way to a legendary racetrack in the Wild West.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Sticky Putty.
programme.desc: Noddy realises that someone has put sticky putty on Clockwork Mouse's key, and comes up with a clever solution when he finds out who did it and why.(n)

programme.title: Floogals
programme.desc: When Hooman dad's vegetables go missing from the garden, the Floogals investigate and meet a rabbit.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: King Thistle orders an overworked Mr Elf to take a holiday, pleasing Mrs Elf and Ben at the prospect of a welcome break.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Leah, Shimmer and Shine meet a mermaid and explore her underwater world.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: When Digby tells his friends that they need to go to Peek Rock to see a special event, Grizel and Mungo decide that they have to get there first.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The family goes on holiday in a van that turns into a house at the push of a button.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The family's camper van turns into a boat during a trip to see ducks on a river.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The duo visit the beehive to see how honey is made, and Wise Old Elf shows them his special way of collecting it. Animated series for pre-school children.(n)

programme.title: Football on 5: The Championship
programme.desc: Highlights from the latest games in the Championship, which included Sunderland v Derby County at The Stadium of Light, Wolverhampton Wanderers v Middlesbrough at Molineux, and Aston Villa v Hull City at Villa Park.(n)

programme.title: Football on 5: Goal Rush
programme.desc: Goals from the weekend's games in Leagues One and Two, which included Southend United v Blackburn Rovers at Roots Hall, Portsmouth v Rochdale at Fratton Park, and Forest Green Rovers v Barnet at The New Lawn.(n)

programme.title: Cheaper By the Dozen 2
programme.desc: Tom and Kate Baker and their 12 children are enjoying a summer holiday together at their lakeside cabin before the last of the kids flies the nest. All is well until Tom realises arch-rival Jimmy Murtaugh and his family are staying nearby, and even though the youngsters are having fun, the fathers succumb to increasingly frequent displays of one-upmanship. Comedy sequel, with Steve Martin, Eugene Levy, Bonnie Hunt and Hilary Duff.(n)

programme.title: The Royals
programme.sub-title: The Royals: Young, Rich & Famous: The Royal Brat Pack.
programme.desc: Documentary investigating how life for the younger members of the royal family has changed over the years, highlighting the differences between the Duke of Edinburgh's strict upbringing in the early 20th century, and Prince Harry's turbulent youth in the early years of the new millennium.(n)

programme.title: Inside Buckingham Palace: The Queen's Worst Year
programme.desc: An in-depth look at the events of 1992, the year Her Majesty famously dubbed her `annus horribilis' in a speech delivered at London's Guildhall to mark the other anniversary of her Accession. It was a year that saw a fire ravage Windsor Castle, the marriages of Anne, Andrew and Charles collapse, Sarah Ferguson appear topless in the newspapers apparently having her toes sucked by her boyfriend, and Andrew Morton's revelations about Diana made public in a best-selling book. Featuring expert analysis from assorted contributors.(n)

programme.title: Inside Buckingham Palace
programme.desc: The first of two documentaries going behind-the-scenes at Buckingham Palace to find out what life is like beyond its grand exterior. The programmes look back at the 60 years since the Queen's Coronation and explores what might happen to the palace when Prince Charles takes the throne. The opening instalment examines the young Queen's ascent to the throne at the age of 25, Philip's extended overseas visit, and the serious security threats in the 1970s. It also explores the battles between Charles and Diana, Anne and Andrew's divorce, and the use of the palace as a royal stage.(n)

programme.title: Inside Buckingham Palace
programme.desc: Although it is closed and secretive, Buckingham Palace has become a symbol of everything British, despite only being a royal palace for less that 200 years. This second of two programmes reflects on previous monarchs' accomplishments during their reign, from Edward VII's commitment in 1901 to making the palace a royal stage, to George V's decision to change the family name from Saxe-Coburg-Gotha to Windsor. Finally, the programme considers the next King, who could bring about another revolution at the palace and change its role further in the future.(n)

programme.title: Dirty Dancing
programme.desc: A dance instructor at a 1960s resort hotel fears his career will be jeopardised when his regular partner is forced to pull out of an important show in which they are due to perform. Luckily, a naive teenager is happy to step in, and is treated to a whirlwind holiday education in life, love and expressing herself. Romantic drama, starring Patrick Swayze, Jennifer Grey and Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.title: Cricket on 5
programme.sub-title: England v South Africa: Fourth Test Day Three.
programme.desc: England v South Africa. Highlights of the third day's play in the final Test of the four-match series, which took place at Old Trafford in Manchester.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.sub-title: Dads Make You Laugh Out Loud.
programme.desc: Compilation of internet videos featuring fathers doing bizarre things, including a showcase of the world's most ridiculous dad dancing and some DIY dentistry using a helicopter to remove a loose tooth. With contributions from comedians Ellie Taylor, Angela Barnes and Dave Spikey.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: A chance to catch up with the latest events inside the house as the celebrities cope with living under constant surveillance, with all the arguments and alliances, as well as the revelations in the diary room.(n)

programme.title: The Last Days of
programme.sub-title: The Last Days of Patrick Swayze.
programme.desc: Forensic pathologist Dr Jason Payne-James examines the death of the movie star in 2009, at the age of 57, after developing pancreatic cancer, a condition that had left him all but unrecognisable. The programme explores extensive medical records to construct a timeline of events leading to his death.(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An FBI agent infiltrates a Californian surfing gang suspected of carrying out a series of armed robberies wearing masks modelled on former US presidents. However, his loyalties are tested to the limits when he is befriended by the gang's leader. Kathryn Bigelow's thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Patrick Swayze, Gary Busey and Lori Petty.(n)

programme.title: Right at Your Door
programme.desc: Doomsday comes to LA in this gripping tale of terror, panic and paranoia. When dirty bombs are detonated over Southern California, a husband (Rory Cochrane) and his wife (Mary McCormack) become quarantined, he inside their house, she outside. As contaminated ash rains down from the sky, chaos reigns across the area as those left out in the open run the risk of being poisoned by the fatal toxins. The film is the directorial debut of production designer Chris Gorak, who also wrote the script(n)

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: World Wrestling Entertainment superstar Kane gives a killer performance as a deranged, hulking psychopath who terrorizes eight teens working to rehab a decrepit hotel. It's no-holds-barred mayhem as the murderer employs a variety of different weapons and instruments to dispatch his victims. Directed by Gregory Dark. WWE head Vince McMahon serves as executive producer. Steven Vidler, Christina Vidal, Michael J. Pagan, Samantha Noble, Cecily Polson, Luke Pegler, Penny McNamee, Craig Horner(n)

programme.title: Fierce People
programme.desc: Bittersweet and poignant coming-of-age tale features an exceptional star turn by Anton Yelchin as an underprivileged teen who spends an enlightening summer at the estate of a well-to-do family, where he ingratiates himself with the affluent locals and is mentored by the clan paterfamilias (Donald Sutherland). Diane Lane. Directed by Griffin Dunne. The screenplay was written by Dirk Wittenborn, who adapted his novel. Kristen Stewart, Chris Evans, Elizabeth Perkins, Blu Mankuma, Christopher Shyer(n)

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Four years after they left school, three old pals team up for a road trip from Georgia to California. Mimi's got dreams of Hollywood, Kit's looking forward to seeing her beau, but Lucy wants escape...and maybe to find the mother she's never met(n)

programme.title: Undercover Brother
programme.desc: Eddie Griffin scores as a hip secret agent in this hilarious spoof of blaxploitation flicks, directed by Malcolm D. Lee. Griffin's character works for a black spy organization that's battling "The Man" and his efforts to suppress black culture. Denise Richards costars as White She-Devil. Chris Kattan, Dave Chappelle(n)

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: Comedian Cedric the Entertainer serves as both producer and star of this comedy about a family who discovers just how much can go wrong en route to a family get-together. When Nate Johnson (Cedric the Entertainer) is invited to a big family reunion in Missouri, he sees it as an opportunity to reconnect with his estranged wife and growing children, as well as a chance to show up his wealthier know-it-all brother, Mack (Steve Harvey). Nate takes delivery on an expensive new SUV, persuades his recently separated wife, Dorothy (Vanessa L. Williams), to tag along, and packs up his three kids -- nubile teenager Nikki (Solange Knowles), under-age wannabe rapper D.J. (Bow Wow), and precocious seven-year-old Destiny (Gabby Soleil) -- for what he imagines will be a leisurely drive from Los Angeles to St. Louis. However, between his wary wife, arguing kids, angry police officers, bizarre hitchhikers, bad diner food, and an unfortunate run-in with a cement mixer, getting from point A to point B proves to be just short of a nightmare. Johnson Family Vacation was the first feature film for director Christopher Erskin, who previously distinguished himself directing music videos for the likes of Missy Elliot, TLC, and Boyz II Men(n)

programme.title: Puerto Ricans in Paris
programme.desc: In this hilarious fish-out-of-water comedy, two Puerto Rican NYC cops are asked by a pair of French fashion designers to come to Paris to hunt down the counterfeiters who stole a couture handbag(n)

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand(n)

programme.title: National Security
programme.desc: Two mismatched security guards are thrown together to bust a smuggling operation(n)

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: When his young cousin is inadvertently charged with murder in an Alabama town, an untested Brooklyn lawyer takes on his first case as he attempts to defend two penniless youths in the heart of Dixie, where he clearly does not understand the protocols of the courtroom...or the South(n)

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: With the help of his best friend John, a sentient teddy bear named Ted fights to be legally recognized as a human so he can have a child with his new wife Tami-Lynn. This gut-busting comedy is a sequel to the 2012 surprise hit(n)

programme.title: Rock Star
programme.desc: Drama about a wannabe rock star who works by day as a copy machine repairman and by night as the lead singer of Blood Pollution, a Pennsylvania tribute band that imitates the heavy metal rockers Steel Dragon. He is devastated when his friends kick him out of the group he founded, but things begin to look up when he is tipped to replace the lead singer of his heavy metal idols. Based on the true story of rock band Judas Priest(n)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: As the end of the first Gulf War nears, a group of adventurous American soldiers attempt to find a huge cache of hidden Iraqi gold. Action(n)

programme.title: Incarnate
programme.desc: An unconventional exorcist must use his psychic abilities to do battle with a malevolent demon that has taken over an innocent 11-year-old boy. Later, he learns that the paranormal entity is also responsible for the deaths of his wife and child(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Jason Statham leads the cast of this high-octane action-thriller set in the post-industrial wasteland of tomorrow, with the world's most brutal sporting event as its backdrop. A penitentiary full of felons has inspired the jailers to create a grisly pastime ripe for lucrative kickbacks. Now, adrenalised inmates, a global audience hungry for televised violence and a spectacular arena come together to form the Death Race. From expert action director Paul W.S. Anderson and the producers of Mission: Impossible comes Death Race! The stakes don't get any higher than this!(n)

programme.title: The Final Conflict
programme.desc: The Antichrist has garnered an ambassadorship when he sees a trio of stars, which indicates the Second Coming, prompting him to order the slaying of infants born on a designated date, even that of his faithful private secretary(n)

programme.title: Undercover Brother
programme.desc: Eddie Griffin scores as a hip secret agent in this hilarious spoof of blaxploitation flicks, directed by Malcolm D. Lee. Griffin's character works for a black spy organization that's battling "The Man" and his efforts to suppress black culture. Denise Richards costars as White She-Devil. Chris Kattan, Dave Chappelle(n)

programme.title: The Color of Money
programme.desc: A pool hustler mentors a talented young player and his street-smart girlfriend, but his attempts to corrupt the young man make him reassess his own decisions in life(n)

programme.title: Private Benjamin
programme.desc: Devastated when her brand-new husband drops dead, ditsy socialite Judy Benjamin buys a pitch delivered by a duplicitous recruiter for the Women's Army Corps. Quickly advised that she won't receive the luxury accommodations she'd been promised, Judy is forced to go through basic training like any other "grunt."(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: After discovering the truth about their walled city and breaking down its oppressive faction system, Tris and Four lead a journey outside of Chicago to learn more about who has been manipulating their civilization. But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind(n)

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: Romantic comedy. A middle-aged teacher and would-be writer takes his soon-to-be married friend on a week-long road trip through California's wine country. While meditating on friendship, love and regret, they meet two free-spirited local women who make them confront their futures(n)

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: (2010) Michael Cera (Juno, Superbad) stars in this unconventionally structured, inventive and comic paean to the alternate universe of manga and computer gaming. The movie is based on an acclaimed series of graphic novels by Canadian cartoonist Bryan Lee O'Malley, and is directed by British film-maker Edgar Wright (Shaun of the Dead, Channel 4's TV series Spaced), here making his Hollywood debut. Computer game fanatic Scott Pilgrim (Cera) is the bass player with Toronto band Sex Bob-omb. He shares his flat with his slightly-out-of-control gay friend Wallace Wells (Kieran Culkin), and courts a little controversy by dating 17-year-old schoolgirl Knives Chau (Ellen Wong). However, theirs is a fairly platonic relationship, and one he's prepared to ditch the moment he sets eyes on the woman (literally) of his dreams: Ramona Flowers (Mary Elizabeth Winstead). But if Scott wants to capture the impossibly cool New Yorker's heart, he must first defeat her former lovers, the Seven Evil Exes, in video game end-level-style combat. So he embarks on a kinetic, romantic quest, largely conducted within his own head, replete with slapstick violence, impressive effects and witty retorts(n)

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz, and Lucy Liu return alongside director McG for the sequel Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle. In this adventure, the Angels are assigned by Charlie to track down a pair of missing rings encoded with the names of every federal witness in the government's protection and relocation program. The women employ all of the skills seen in the first film in order to stop the bad guys (and bad girls). Bill Murray declined to appear in the sequel. The role of Bosley has been taken over by Bernie Mac. Demi Moore rounds out the cast of this big-budget spectacle(n)

programme.title: The Last Boy Scout
programme.desc: An ex-quarterback teams up with a down-on-his-luck PI whose quarry is murdered while he was supposed to be protecting her(n)

programme.title: Rendition
programme.desc: The director of the Academy Award-winning 2006 crime drama Tsotsi returns to the helm with this tale of a Middle East CIA operative who begins to have doubts about his latest assignment after witnessing the interrogation of a suspected suicide bomber by secret police. When Egyptian-born chemical engineer Anwar El-Ibrahimi (Omar Metwally) mysteriously vanishes on a routine flight from South Africa to Washington, his wife, Isabella (Reese Witherspoon), embarks on a frantic international search for her missing husband. At the same time, a CIA analyst (Jake Gyllenhaal) arrives at a clandestine detention facility outside of United States. As the interrogation of El-Ibrahimi gets under way, the CIA analyst is profoundly shaken by the unorthodox methods used by the man's captors, and quickly begins to reevaluate his assignment. Peter Sarsgaard, Meryl Streep, and Alan Arkin co-star in this topical political thriller penned by Kelley Sane and produced by Steve Golin(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: After discovering the truth about their walled city and breaking down its oppressive faction system, Tris and Four lead a journey outside of Chicago to learn more about who has been manipulating their civilization. But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: Humans and orcs clash in this film adaptation of the popular video-game series(n)

programme.title: Right at Your Door
programme.desc: Doomsday comes to LA in this gripping tale of terror, panic and paranoia. programme.desc: Jason Statham leads the cast of this high-octane action-thriller set in the post-industrial wasteland of tomorrow, with the world's most brutal sporting event as its backdrop. A penitentiary full of felons has inspired the jailers to create a grisly pastime ripe for lucrative kickbacks. Now, adrenalised inmates, a global audience hungry for televised violence and a spectacular arena come together to form the Death Race. From expert action director Paul W.S. Anderson and the producers of Mission: Impossible comes Death Race! The stakes don't get any higher than this!(n)

programme.title: The Final Conflict
programme.desc: The Antichrist has garnered an ambassadorship when he sees a trio of stars, which indicates the Second Coming, prompting him to order the slaying of infants born on a designated date, even that of his faithful private secretary(n)

programme.title: Undercover Brother
programme.desc: Eddie Griffin scores as a hip secret agent in this hilarious spoof of blaxploitation flicks, directed by Malcolm D. Lee. Griffin's character works for a black spy organization that's battling "The Man" and his efforts to suppress black culture. Denise Richards costars as White She-Devil. Chris Kattan, Dave Chappelle(n)

programme.title: The Color of Money
programme.desc: A pool hustler mentors a talented young player and his street-smart girlfriend, but his attempts to corrupt the young man make him reassess his own decisions in life(n)

programme.title: Private Benjamin
programme.desc: Devastated when her brand-new husband drops dead, ditsy socialite Judy Benjamin buys a pitch delivered by a duplicitous recruiter for the Women's Army Corps. Quickly advised that she won't receive the luxury accommodations she'd been promised, Judy is forced to go through basic training like any other "grunt."(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: After discovering the truth about their walled city and breaking down its oppressive faction system, Tris and Four lead a journey outside of Chicago to learn more about who has been manipulating their civilization. But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind(n)

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: Romantic comedy. A middle-aged teacher and would-be writer takes his soon-to-be married friend on a week-long road trip through California's wine country. While meditating on friendship, love and regret, they meet two free-spirited local women who make them confront their futures(n)

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: (2010) Michael Cera (Juno, Superbad) stars in this unconventionally structured, inventive and comic paean to the alternate universe of manga and computer gaming. The movie is based on an acclaimed series of graphic novels by Canadian cartoonist Bryan Lee O'Malley, and is directed by British film-maker Edgar Wright (Shaun of the Dead, Channel 4's TV series Spaced), here making his Hollywood debut. Computer game fanatic Scott Pilgrim (Cera) is the bass player with Toronto band Sex Bob-omb. He shares his flat with his slightly-out-of-control gay friend Wallace Wells (Kieran Culkin), and courts a little controversy by dating 17-year-old schoolgirl Knives Chau (Ellen Wong). However, theirs is a fairly platonic relationship, and one he's prepared to ditch the moment he sets eyes on the woman (literally) of his dreams: Ramona Flowers (Mary Elizabeth Winstead). But if Scott wants to capture the impossibly cool New Yorker's heart, he must first defeat her former lovers, the Seven Evil Exes, in video game end-level-style combat. So he embarks on a kinetic, romantic quest, largely conducted within his own head, replete with slapstick violence, impressive effects and witty retorts(n)

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz, and Lucy Liu return alongside director McG for the sequel Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle. In this adventure, the Angels are assigned by Charlie to track down a pair of missing rings encoded with the names of every federal witness in the government's protection and relocation program. The women employ all of the skills seen in the first film in order to stop the bad guys (and bad girls). Bill Murray declined to appear in the sequel. The role of Bosley has been taken over by Bernie Mac. Demi Moore rounds out the cast of this big-budget spectacle(n)

programme.title: The Last Boy Scout
programme.desc: An ex-quarterback teams up with a down-on-his-luck PI whose quarry is murdered while he was supposed to be protecting her(n)

programme.title: Rendition
programme.desc: The director of the Academy Award-winning 2006 crime drama Tsotsi returns to the helm with this tale of a Middle East CIA operative who begins to have doubts about his latest assignment after witnessing the interrogation of a suspected suicide bomber by secret police. When Egyptian-born chemical engineer Anwar El-Ibrahimi (Omar Metwally) mysteriously vanishes on a routine flight from South Africa to Washington, his wife, Isabella (Reese Witherspoon), embarks on a frantic international search for her missing husband. At the same time, a CIA analyst (Jake Gyllenhaal) arrives at a clandestine detention facility outside of United States. As the interrogation of El-Ibrahimi gets under way, the CIA analyst is profoundly shaken by the unorthodox methods used by the man's captors, and quickly begins to reevaluate his assignment. Peter Sarsgaard, Meryl Streep, and Alan Arkin co-star in this topical political thriller penned by Kelley Sane and produced by Steve Golin(n)

programme.desc: The Farrelly Brothers all-out comedy film stars Jim Carrey as Charlie, a nice-guy cop who's had a hard life - on his wedding day, his wife ran off with the wedding car driver, leaving him to bring up triplets. Fifteen years later, he's had enough of the jokes and jibes and out bursts Hank, a bad cop character who will bust anyone for anything. But then he and his long-suffering girlfriend Irene come across cop corruption and, pursued by the evil Lt Gerke, must go on the run, and need both Charlie and Hank's special skills to keep them alive(n)

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: When a one-night stand that should have stayed that way has unexpected consequences, the reluctant odd couple attempts to transform their tentative relationship into a lasting love in this conception comedy. Twenty-four-year-old entertainment journalist Alison Scott (Katherine Heigl) is on the fast track to the big time, but an alcohol-fueled hookup with responsibility-shirking slacker Ben Stone (Seth Rogen) finds her professional priorities taking a back seat to having a baby. Now, as overgrown kid Ben attempts to assume the responsibilities of fatherhood, he makes the brave decision to stand by Alison. In order to make things work between the pair, however, there's going to have to be some compromise, and when Alison and Ben decide to take a shot at love, they quickly find that building a relationship from scratch isn't nearly as easy as making a baby(n)

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: In the art of crashing weddings, John Beckwith (Owen Wilson) and Jeremy Grey (Vince Vaughn) are Washington D.C.'s undisputed masters. Guided by their intricate wedding-crashing rules, each week they charm their way into a different wedding -- and romance a different woman to boot. But when they crash the biggest wedding of the year, the ultimate crashers soon find themselves in over their heads as they become hilariously entangled in the eccentricity of the influential political family hosting the event. Christopher Walken, Jane Seymour, Rachel McAdams, Isla Fisher, and Bradley Cooper round up a cast with impressive star wattage and impeccable comedic timing(n)

programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.sub-title: Dead Woman Walking: The Karla Faye Tucker Story
programme.desc: Dead Woman Walking: The Karla Faye Tucker Story. This documentary, part of the American Justice series from A&E, examines the Texas death penalty case of Karla Faye Walker. Narrated by American Justice host and producer Bill Kurtis, this episode goes inside the investigation of the two murders that Walker and her boyfriend Daniel Ryan Garrett committed. The trial of Walker is shown through exclusive footage. After the conviction, American Justice follows her through her daily life, showing her prison surroundings and talking with her about her crimes. Sentenced to death, while Walker was waiting to be executed, she became a born-again Christian. Her lawyers used this transformation as leverage to try to get her death sentence reduced to life in prison. Their attempts were unsuccessful and Walker was killed by lethal injection in February 1998. American Justice also shows interviews with lawyers and law enforcement professionals who knew Walker(n)

programme.title: E:60 Pictures
programme.sub-title: What Lies Beneath: The Mick Fanning Story
programme.desc: What Lies Beneath: The Mick Fanning Story. Profiling three-time world-champion surfer Mick Fanning, with a look at his triumphant return from a 2015 shark attack in South Africa, plus family tragedy he endured on his rise to prominence. Narrated by actor and surfing enthusiast Chris Hemsworth, with insight from fellow surfers including Joel Parkinson(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Machine
programme.desc: A 2008 documentary in which Professor Brian Cox visits Geneva to look around Cern's Large Hadron Collider - the world's most powerful particle collider - before the apparatus goes live. He explains why some scientists believe the experiment will be able to recreate the conditions that existed a billionth of a second after the Big Bang, and reveal some of the mysteries of creation.(n)

programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: Horizon: What on Earth Is Wrong with Gravity?.
programme.desc: Physicist Dr Brian Cox tries to solve the centuries-old mystery of gravity. Unconventionally competing with Newton and Einstein, he starts in Texas, firing a laser at the moon, before moving on to a sat-nav in Denver and a Louisiana swamp. The real issues are in the area of quantum physics for, as he discovers, that is the science of absolutely everything.(n)

programme.title: Can We Make a Star on Earth
programme.desc: Professor Brian Cox embarks on a global tour to discover why, after decades of research, nuclear fusion has not yet become a feasible source of energy.(n)

programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: Horizon: Swallowed by a Black Hole.
programme.desc: Documentary examining what would happen to a gas cloud that strayed within the gravitational reach of a supermassive black hole in the centre of the Milky Way. Across the globe, telescopes were trained on the heart of Earth's galaxy in the expectation of observing the cosmic spectacle for the first time in history.(n)

programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: Horizon: Do You Know What Time It Is?.
programme.desc: Particle physicist Brian Cox investigates the concept of time, exploring its origins and its limits, and questioning whether travelling through it will ever be possible. He travels to Mexico, where the ancient Mayans once built temples dedicated to the subject, and dispels popular misconceptions about the length of the average day.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Miracle Orphans
programme.desc: Presenters Ellie Harrison and Max Hug Williams follow orphaned baby animals as they make steps to return to the wild. Ellie travels to Australia to meet three koalas called Tilly, Puddles and Danny, who were rescued from the roadside where their mother had been killed - Danny needs around-the-clock care and is building up his strength with night-time games of chase. She also meets a tiny wallaby called Neil, whose carer Stella is worried may die from stress if they can't find him a companion. Elsewhere, wildlife cameraman Max is in Costa Rica where he gets acquainted with Newbie, a five-month-old three-toed sloth who has suffered from pneumonia since she was rescued. He follows wildlife manager Sam at Kids Saving the Rainforest as she tries to teach the baby sloth to climb trees and learn to go back to the wild.(n)

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: A look at some of the world's strongest creatures.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Super Senses: The Secret Power of Animals
programme.desc: Biologist Patrick Aryee and physicist Helen Czerski explore the world of animal senses to reveal how they detect things beyond the limits of human perception, conducting experiments and demonstrations featuring a variety of species. They begin by investigating sight and reveal how caribou - wild reindeer of Alaska - use ultraviolet light to avoid their predators. They also discover how the dragonfly's ability to view things in slow motion allows it to make a kill, and show how a snake can see in the pitch dark without using its eyes.(n)

programme.title: Super Senses: The Secret Power of Animals
programme.desc: Biologist Patrick Aryee and physicist Helen Czerski continue their exploration of the world of animal senses by investigating sound - from the deepest rumbles to the highest squeaks - using specialised technology to detect noises beyond the range of human hearing. They reveal how alligators use low-pitch sounds to make the water around them `dance', show what it is like to be a bat and see with echo-location, and convert a classic camper van into a giant speaker to conduct the ultimate hearing test for a herd of elephants.(n)

programme.title: Super Senses: The Secret Power of Animals
programme.desc: The concluding episode explores the world of scent and examines the animals that have pushed their sense of smell far beyond human capabilities. In the Bahamas, physicist Helen Czerski dives into shark-infested waters with only a small pouch of liquid as her defence against them, while biologist Patrick Aryee controls the behaviour of a swarm of bees by using tiny traces of scent, and gets uncomfortably close to a skunk.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Jaguar
programme.desc: Scientists, climbers and wildlife film-makers explore the rainforests of Guyana, a former British colony in South America. Cameraman Gordon Buchanan finds giant otters almost as large as he is, canopy expert Justine Evans observes a family of red howler monkeys, and biologist Steve Backshall probes a habitat below a massive waterfall where frogs and freshwater crabs happily co-exist.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Jaguar
programme.desc: The team travels deeper into the Guyanan jungle and scorpions and poisonous centipedes enter the base camp. Gordon Buchanan discovers an animal is stealing supplies and Steve Backshall finds giant piranha and long-fanged sabretooth fish in the river. Meanwhile, George McGavin catches an enormous tarantula and the climbing team tries to scale a huge unclimbed mountain at the forest's edge.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Jaguar
programme.desc: Steve Backshall reaches the summit of a table-top mountain, after climbing a vertical cliff face nearly as high as the Empire State Building. Meanwhile, Dr George McGavin and Gordon Buchanan have to haul three boats and all their kit through the jungle after finding the rapids of the Rewa River impassable. At the end of the journey, George presents a report on the expedition to the President of Guyana, Bharrat Jagdeo. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: Ben Stiller plays high school geek Ted, invited to the prom by the gorgeous Mary. He can hardly believe his luck; but the night goes wrong when he arrives to pick up his date, and has a painful accident in the toilet, failing to stow his tackle before zipping up. Thirteen years later Ted still yearns for what might have been and hires private dick Pat Healy to find Mary. The detective succeeds but also falls for her and feeds Ted false information so he can keep her for himself. But a suspicious Ted takes matters into his own hands and finds he's in the middle of a love pentagon also involving an architect and an NFL quarterback. With the addition of gags involving a speed-freaked dog, Mary's use of what she believes is Ted's hair gel and a minstrel troupe who follow Ted around, the resulting comedy may not be subtle but is very funny(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on US President George W Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after questions were raised about the validity of key documents in the report(n)

programme.title: Terms of Endearment
programme.desc: Shirley MacLaine and Debra Winger lead an all-star cast in James L. Brook's Oscar winning drama as a mother and daughter who find out just how difficult love can be(n)

programme.title: Thank You for Smoking
programme.desc: Aaron Eckhart lights up the screen in this hilarious satire about a gleefully amoral tobacco industry lobbyist who stops at nothing to put a positive spin on smoking as he clashes with a senator (William H. Macy), who wants to snuff out cigarettes. Maria Bello, Adam Brody, Sam Elliott, Katie Holmes, Rob Lowe. Directed by Jason Reitman(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Spy thriller charting the life of the man charged with heading the CIA's covert operations and uncovering a mole during the Bay of Pigs scandal, revealing how he changed from a once idealistic student into the untrusting overlord of American espionage(n)

programme.title: Die Another Day
programme.desc: Pierce Brosnan plays superspy James Bond for the fourth time in this action-packed adventure. This time out, 007 and an enigmatic woman named Jinx (Halle Berry) take on a madman with a satellite-laser weapon. Madonna sings the title song and has a cameo. Rick Yune(n)

programme.title: Live and Let Die
programme.desc: Investigating the deaths of three British agents, 007 encounters Mr. Big and Dr. Kananga, leaders of a vast crime network(n)

programme.title: Top Secret!
programme.desc: An American rock and roll singer becomes involved in a Resistance plot to rescue a scientist imprisoned in East Germany(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Ben Gates is off on another thrilling treasure hunt in this action-packed sequel involving a missing page from John Wilkes Booth's diary, which leads to a globe-trotting race to find an ancient city of gold(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: Julianne Potter is horrified when she hears that her best friend, Michael O'Neal, is getting hitched; it was meant to be her! Installed as the maid of honour, she has just four days to convince him that Kimberly Wallace, who's beautiful, smart and loaded, isn't the girl for him. After Muriel's Wedding , PJ Hogan pulls off another successful nuptial comedy-drama(n)

programme.title: Die Another Day
programme.desc: Pierce Brosnan plays superspy James Bond for the fourth time in this action-packed adventure. This time out, 007 and an enigmatic woman named Jinx (Halle Berry) take on a madman with a satellite-laser weapon. Madonna sings the title song and has a cameo. Rick Yune(n)

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese re-creates the mean streets of Manhattan in this historical epic set in the 1860s. Daniel Day-Lewis is a brutal gang leader; Leonardo DiCaprio, a victim's son(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
