When she insists he return home to Germany, he reappears in a bad wig as alter ego "Toni Erdmann" and insinuates himself into her work circles. Their mutual aggravation begins to heal their fractured relationship(n)

programme.title: The Family Fang
programme.desc: Siblings reunite at their childhood home after their parents, avant-garde artists who specialise in public comedy skits, go missing. They soon wonder if their parents are truly in trouble, or if their disappearance is their final stunt(n)

programme.title: Rio, I Love You
programme.desc: Another installment of the "Cities of Love" series, this anthology film depicts romantic encounters in different neighborhoods of Rio de Janeiro. In all, 10 shorts are woven together to spin a tale of love in "the Marvelous City."(n)

programme.title: 2016 Oscar Nominated Live Action Short Films
programme.desc: A compilation of live-action short films nominated for Academy Awards(n)

programme.title: The Raven
programme.desc: John Cusack stars in James McTeigue's period thriller. It's 1849 and times are bad for Gothic horror writer Edgar Allan Poe - his glory days are far behind him and he can't even scrape together the money for the alcohol he craves. Then a killer begins terrorising Baltimore with a series of grisly slayings based on Poe's celebrated stories and the author finds himself in the spotlight. Once cleared of involvement in the case, Poe is invited to help Detective Fields track down the murderer. But things take on a greater urgency when Poe's beloved Emily Hamilton is kidnapped and he's sent a note by the killer telling Poe that he must publish a new story... Also starring Brendan Gleeson(n)

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Both laughs and thrills are on the masthead in this comedy drama about a would-be reporter written and directed by Woody Allen. Sondra Pransky (Scarlett Johansson) is an American journalism student who travels to England to visit friends. While in London, she attends a magic show where magician Sid "Splendini" Waterman (Woody Allen) brings her on-stage as part of a trick in which he makes her disappear. However, while waiting to be "de-materialized," she's visited by the ghost of a murdered reporter (Ian McShane), who passes along the scoop of the decade. The spirit claims that Peter Lyman (Hugh Jackman), the wealthy and handsome son of a well-known aristocrat, is leading a double life as "the Tarot Card Killer," a serial murderer who has been terrifying the nation and eluding police. With the magician's help, Jane begins investigating the story and is able to piece together some incriminating evidence against Lyman. However, the more she learns, the more dangerous her investigation becomes -- especially when she falls into a romance with the suspected killer. Scoop was Woody Allen's second consecutive film with leading lady Scarlett Johansson, after the critically acclaimed Match Point; it was also Allen's second feature to be shot in Great Britain(n)

programme.title: Solitary Man
programme.desc: Unscrupulous New York businessman Ben Kalmen attempts to pick up the pieces after a series of poor decisions leaves his life in ruins. Now, if he can just keep his salacious impulses in check, he may be back on the road to success. But when Ben takes his new girlfriend's college-bound daughter to look at a prospective school, everything starts to fall apart(n)

programme.title: Julieta
programme.desc: Middle-aged Julieta (Emma Suarez) learns via a chance meeting with an acquaintance that her long-lost daughter has resurfaced in Madrid. This revelation forces her to reflect on her checkered past, as she recalls the moments of pain that defined her current life. This drama was directed by Spanish master Pedro Almodóvar, and was adapted from three short stories by acclaimed author Alice Munro(n)

programme.title: Lovely & Amazing
programme.desc: Brenda Blethyn plays a mother to grown up daughters Catherine Keener, an 'artist', and Emily Mortimer, an actress plus Raven Goodwin, who is adopted and just eight. Nicole Holofcener celebrates their lives, loves and misfortunes in this perceptive, sometimes funny, sometimes tragic gem of a film(n)

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: A starry-eyed would-be star discovers just how far the notion that "there's no such thing as bad publicity" can go in this screen adaptation of the hit Broadway musical +Chicago, originally directed and choreographed by Bob Fosse. In the mid-'20s, Roxie Hart (Renee Zellweger) is a small-time chorus dancer married to a well-meaning dunderhead named Amos (John C. Reilly). Roxie is having an affair on the side with Fred Casley (Dominic West), a smooth talker who insists he can make her a star. However, Fred strings Roxie along a bit too far for his own good, and when she realizes that his promises are empty, she becomes enraged and murders Fred in cold blood. Roxie soon finds herself behind bars alongside Velma Kelly (Catherine Zeta-Jones), a sexy vaudeville star who used to perform with her sister until Velma discovered that her sister had been sleeping with her husband. Velma shot them both dead, and, after scheming prison matron "Mama" Morton hooks Velma up with hotshot lawyer Billy Flynn (Richard Gere), Velma becomes the new Queen of the scandal sheets. Roxie is just shrewd enough to realize that her poor fortune could also bring her fame, so she convinces Amos to also hire Flynn. Soon Flynn is splashing Roxie's story -- or, more accurately, a highly melodramatic revision of Roxie's story -- all over the gutter press, and Roxy and Velma are soon battling neck-to-neck over who can win greater fame through the headlines. A project that had been moving from studio to studio since the musical opened on Broadway in 1973, Chicago also features guest appearances by Lucy Liu and Christine Baranski(n)

programme.title: Miles Ahead
programme.desc: This free-form biopic of jazz musician Miles Davis depicts his attempts at a career comeback following a period of listlessness in the '70s, his relationship with a journalist who wants to profile him and his troubled marriage to a former dancer(n)

programme.title: Gods and Monsters
programme.desc: Offbeat biography about the life of eccentric British filmmaker James Whale, who directed the original Frankenstein. Ian McKellen and Lynn Redgrave received Oscar nominations for their performances(n)

programme.title: Julieta
programme.desc: Middle-aged Julieta (Emma Suarez) learns via a chance meeting with an acquaintance that her long-lost daughter has resurfaced in Madrid. This revelation forces her to reflect on her checkered past, as she recalls the moments of pain that defined her current life. This drama was directed by Spanish master Pedro Almodóvar, and was adapted from three short stories by acclaimed author Alice Munro(n)

programme.title: The Young Victoria
programme.desc: Queen Victoria deals with turbulent 19th-century politics while coping with societal pressure to marry someone other than her true love, Prince Albert(n)

programme.title: Miles Ahead
programme.desc: This free-form biopic of jazz musician Miles Davis depicts his attempts at a career comeback following a period of listlessness in the '70s, his relationship with a journalist who wants to profile him and his troubled marriage to a former dancer(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr. Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk
programme.desc: A mysterious Tibetan monk and a young street kid become unlikely allies to help protect a powerful, sacred scroll. Sean William Scott stars (2003)(n)

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Three childhood friends who get together every Christmas Eve plan one last epic night out to celebrate the end of an era(n)

programme.title: Super Capers
programme.desc: A wannabe superhero joins a team of bumbling heroes-in-training on a time-traveling mission to thwart an evil plot in this high-flying comedy featuring Clint Howard, Adam West, Tom Sizemore, and Doug Jones. Ed Gruberman (Justin Whalin) may not possess any actual superpowers, but his passion for fighting crime rivals that of even the greatest comic-book do-gooders. When Ed becomes a member of The Super Capers, an oddball team of aspiring superheroes, it seems as if his dream of fighting crime for real is about to come true. Upon discovering evidence of an evil plot involving gold bullion, an alluring femme fatale, and a powerful criminal mastermind, Ed travels back in time to prevent a disaster the likes of which the world has never seen(n)

programme.title: Mousehunt
programme.desc: In this wacky kid-friendly romp, the unlucky Smuntz brothers (Nathan Lane, Lee Evans) inherit a mansion and discover that there's a mouse living on the premises. Unfortunately, the tiny and tenacious tenant has no intention of leaving(n)

programme.title: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
programme.desc: When Jon follows his girlfriend Liz to London, intending to propose, lasagne-loving cat Garfied and his pal Odie stow away in Jon's bag. While sightseeing Garfield is mistaken for a regal cat called Prince, who looks just like him. He's taken to Prince's castle, where evil Lord Dargis tried to get rid of him and claim the castle. There's lots of feline fun as the identity swap causes chaoes, but there's a happy ending for animals and humans in this star-studded second full-length movie starring the lovable but lazy cat(n)

programme.title: An Ideal Husband
programme.desc: Adaptation of Oscar Wilde's 1895 play about a rising young politician who is blackmailed by a socialite, which touches off a series of misunderstandings, romantic complications and drawing-room intrigues(n)

programme.title: Ali G Indahouse
programme.desc: Ali G is the U.K.'s hottest comic sensation. In his big-screen debut, the chilled-out,hip-hopping, white gangsta-rapper wannabe finds himself in the bizarre positionof having to resolve one of Great Britain's biggest national and political scandals.Abetted by his loyal crew, the West Staines Massive and long suffering girlfriendMe Julie, he emerges as the unlikeliest of heroes(n)

programme.title: Prime
programme.desc: A recent divorcée begins a relationship with her therapist-friend's younger son in this by-the-numbers romantic comedy(n)

programme.title: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
programme.desc: Slapstick sequel with clueless cop Frank Drebin saving the Oscars from a mad bomber. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk
programme.desc: A mysterious Tibetan monk and a young street kid become unlikely allies to help protect a powerful, sacred scroll. Sean William Scott stars (2003)(n)

programme.title: John Tucker Must Die
programme.desc: John Tucker is a high school basketball star dating three girls at the same time: the activist vegan, the over-achieving blonde journalist, and the sassy cheerleading squad captain. They all find out about each other and with the help of the shy new girl in school, Kate, they plot a devious revenge. The girls decide to combine their knowledge to make Kate into the perfect seduction machine and break Tucker's heart(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: It's 1981 and the last day at a Maine summer camp, where both the counselors and the campers are looking for a good time.This hilarious spoof of the summer-camp films of the '70s and '80s features Janeane Garofalo as the chief counselor and David Hyde Pierce as the object of her affection. Written by Michael Showalter and David Wain of the sketch comedy The State. Paul Rudd, Molly Shannon, Amy Poehler, Christopher Meloni(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr. Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.title: Major League
programme.desc: Baseball comedy following a team of bungling amateurs and over-the-hill athletes through an unexpected winning streak. When a former chorus girl inherits the ownership of the Cleveland Indians from her deceased husband, she deliberately puts together a bad team in an attempt to relocate them to Miami. But, against all odds, the team begins winning matches. A sequel followed in 1994(n)

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Chalk 'n' cheese sisters Cameron Diaz and Toni Collette fall out over a man. Can long-lost gran Shirley MacLaine bring them back together? Comedy drama. Sexual references(n)

programme.title: Year One
programme.desc: Jack Black and Michael Cera headline Harold Ramis' Stone Age comedy about a pair of lazy hunter-gatherers who embark on a wild journey through the ancient world after being banished from their primitive village(n)

programme.title: Nine Months
programme.desc: Hugh Grant plays child psychiatrist Samuel Faulkner who, ironically, can't stand children. So when long-standing girlfriend Rebecca Taylor announces she's pregnant, he's less than thrilled and eventually, fed-up with his moaning, she moves out to stay with friends Marty and Gail Dwyer. This being a Chris Columbus film, it all ends happily but not without a lot of fun along the way, particularly from Robin Williams as Russian obstetrician Dr Kosevich who is not just prone to malapropisms, but hasn't actually delivered a baby before(n)

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: Kevin James cowrote and stars in this farce about a mild-mannered security guard at a New Jersey mall who has to save the day when a gang of thieves try to pull a big heist(n)

programme.title: Safe Men
programme.desc: Two inept young men are recruited as safecrackers by a Jewish gangster who wants them to steal a Stanley Cup from the safe of 'Good Stuff Leo' - another Jewish gangster - so he can present the prize to his son as a bar mitzvah present. Sam Rockwell, Steve Zahn, Paul Giamatti, Harvey Fierstein, Christina Kirk, Michael Lerner(n)

programme.title: Honey
programme.desc: A dancer tries to balance her dreams of stardom with her devotion to her old neighborhood. Rappers Missy Elliott, Ginuwine and Jadakiss have cameos(n)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The lives and interrelationships among black Marines on their final mission in the Vietnam War(n)

programme.title: Ride
programme.desc: A rag tag group of rap hopefuls is persuaded by record company executives to take a bus to Miami for a video shoot. Of course, this ride turns out to be anything but smooth. The funniest parts of this satire on the world of hip hop and rappers are the in-jokes and cameo appearances by famous names from the genre(n)

programme.title: Go
programme.desc: Doug Liman (Swingers) takes seemingly disparate stories and, in a cult film favourably compared to Pulp Fiction, interleaves them to a coherent finale. Sarah Polley (The Claim) is an LA checkout girl who arranges to pick up drugs for Scott Wolf and Jay Mohr for a little rent money, little knowing they're working for undercover cop William Fichtner (Pearl Harbor, Black Hawk Down). Meanwhile, in Las Vegas, her work colleague Desmond Askew is in trouble with the owners of a topless bar(n)

programme.title: The Great White Hype
programme.desc: Chaotic comedy about a flamboyant boxing promoter's search for a new gimmick to boost the popularity of the black star he manages(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: New Man. Ghost finds himself trapped in a new business venture. Tommy escapes to Chicago for a meeting that takes a turn. With Ghost released, Jukebox and Kanan revisit their plan to kidnap Tariq(n)

programme.title: The Wood
programme.desc: Rick Famuyiwa's comedy/drama stars Taye Diggs, Richard T Jones from Phone Booth and Omar Epps, seen meeting up on Digg's wedding day. Or rather, not meeting up - he's done a runner but his friends track him down and as they try to give him the courage to make it to the wedding. Their stories are recounted from their youth in the 80s (with Trent Cameron, Duane Finley and Sean Nelson as the younger versions), when they met at high school and follows them through their rites-of-passage - dating, getting involved in a store robbery by mistake, getting their first jobs. Famuyiwa's debut movie, following three black middle class teenagers, has a certain charm and the three leads are ably supported by a cast including Malinda Williams as the cutest girl in school and Tamal Jones as the ex-girlfriend Diggs seeks refuge with in the Wood rather than the Hood(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: New Man. Ghost finds himself trapped in a new business venture. Tommy escapes to Chicago for a meeting that takes a turn. With Ghost released, Jukebox and Kanan revisit their plan to kidnap Tariq(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is the sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, only to find himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Cuba Gooding Jr. (a role that was to win him an Oscar). His personal life starts to fall apart, as he's torn between love and money in Cameron Crowe's metaphor on American's need for success and money(n)

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
programme.desc: A professional thief tries to recover a prized ring taken from him by a ruthless millionaire(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: A female-led reboot of the classic franchise(n)

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: A skilled medieval warrior and his small clan fight back against an oppressive ruler in order to avenge the murder of their master(n)

programme.title: Under Suspicion
programme.desc: When a powerful man is accused of murder, who tells the truth -- the man, or his estranged wife? Henry Hearst (Gene Hackman), an American attorney living in Puerto Rico, is called in to speak with police detective Victor Benezet (Morgan Freeman). A few days earlier, Hearst reported finding the body of a 12-year-old girl while taking his dog for a walk; however, investigators now believe that Hearst may have had a greater involvement in the crime than he's admitting. Under intense questioning by a confident young cop named Owens (Thomas Jane) and gentler but firm interrogation from Benezet, several cracks begin to appear in Hearst's story, but he's able to persuade the police to allow him to leave long enough to take part in a fund-raising function he'd promised to attend. However, upon his return, Hearst discovers that Benezet and Owens have been questioning someone else -- his wife Chantal (Monica Bellucci), who has been on poor terms with her husband for some time. Under Suspicion was based on the novel Brainwash by John Wainwright, which was previously filmed by French director Claude Miller as Garde a vue(n)

programme.title: Running Scared
programme.desc: Lots of laughs and a great camaraderie is the recipe for two street-wise cops that have decided to quit the force and open a bar. However, the duo's plans come to an abrupt halt when Julio, a drug dealer who nearly killed them, has made bail and is about to complete a major drug deal. This motivates the two to stick with police work and bring Julio to justice(n)

programme.title: Silver Streak
programme.desc: Farcical comedy in which a mild-mannered book publisher's train journey to Chicago goes wildly off the tracks when he stumbles on a murder plot. Hitchcock meets farce in this runaway romp which paired Gene Wilder and Richard Pryor for the first time(n)

programme.title: Obsessed
programme.desc: Married asset manager Derek gets a beautiful new assistant, but his life becomes a living hell when her efforts to win his attention become more and more extreme(n)

programme.title: She Hate Me
programme.desc: When an executive is fired for 'blowing the whistle' on his dodgy bosses, he begins to earn a living by helping lesbian couples to start families. Comedy(n)

programme.desc: A female-led reboot of the classic franchise(n)

programme.desc: Young couple Chris and Lisa Mattson are terrorised by their new neighbour, racist cop Abel Turner. Thriller(n)

programme.title: Tales From the Hood
programme.desc: In this chilling anthology of inner-city horror stories, a mortician shares grisly tales about his "patrons" when a group of crooks show up at his funeral home looking for a stash of drugs(n)

programme.title: High School Musical 3: Senior Year
programme.desc: The third entry in the series is another song-and-dance extravaganza that sees the gang being faced with important life decisions regarding their futures(n)

programme.title: Into the West
programme.desc: Mike Newell directs Jim Sheridan's screenplay (based on a story by Tim Palmer) in this enchanting and magical modern-day fairy tale. Gabriel Byrne plays Papa Reilly, a widower who lives with his two young sons, Ossie (Ciaran Fitzgerald) and Tito (Ruaidhri Conroy), in the slums of Dublin. There seems to be no hope for their bleak existence until the children's grandfather (David Kelly) arrives. Accompanying him is a beautiful and imposing white stallion named Tir na nOg, a magical creature from ancient Irish legends. The stallion takes a shine to the boys and they love the horse in return. But a legion of corrupt police plot to impound the horse for the purpose of selling it to a rich businessman. Ossie and Tito sneak off to rescue Tir na nOg. Grabbing the stallion, they get their father and, as the police chase after them, they make their way west(n)

programme.title: Kingdom Come
programme.desc: This familial comedy centers around the matriarch of an extended, dysfunctional family who reunite after the death of her husband, though it's apparent by everyone's reactions that the old man couldn't have died soon enough(n)

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: Old-fashioned romantic tale about a long-distance relationship that begins when a widower's young son tells a radio phone-in show that his dad needs a new wife. The broadcast is heard by countless eligible women who then write to him via the programme, but the youngster realises that only one of them is Miss Right. His matchmaking abilities are tested to the full when he discovers that the woman in question lives on the other side of America, and his dad is dating someone else(n)

programme.title: Pit Pony
programme.desc: Period drama based on the hugely successful Canadian novel about a young boy, Willie, and his pony Gem who are sent to work in the local coal mine. Although Willie dreads it at first, he soon learns that life in the pit is not all bad(n)

programme.title: Underdog Kids
programme.desc: Inner city kids train for a karate match against champs from Beverly Hills with the help of an ex-MMA fighter who is their coach(n)

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: Old-fashioned romantic tale about a long-distance relationship that begins when a widower's young son tells a radio phone-in show that his dad needs a new wife. The broadcast is heard by countless eligible women who then write to him via the programme, but the youngster realises that only one of them is Miss Right. His matchmaking abilities are tested to the full when he discovers that the woman in question lives on the other side of America, and his dad is dating someone else(n)

programme.title: Kingdom Come

programme.title: Aquamarine
programme.desc: Elizabeth Allen's teen comedy stars Sara Paxton as the titular Aquamarine, a mermaid washed ashore in a storm. She is discovered by Claire and Hailey and, able to take human form during the day and when dry, the three form a bond. The trio concoct a plan to win the heart of hunky lifeguard Raymond, to the fury of the jealous Cecilia who starts snooping around. Can Aquamarine guard her secret, will she learn about love and will she grant a wish for Hailey that will keep her and Emma friends?(n)

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: As a young boy, Bruce Wayne watched in horror as his millionaire parents were slain in front of him--a trauma that leads him to become obsessed with revenge. But the opportunity to avenge his parents' deaths is cruelly taken away from him by fate. Fleeing to the East, where he seeks counsel with the dangerous but honourable ninja cult leader known as Ra's Al-Ghul, Bruce returns to his now decaying Gotham City, which is overrun by organised crime and other dangerous individuals manipulating the system. Meanwhile, Bruce is slowly being swindled out of Wayne Industries, the company he inherited. The discovery of a cave under his mansion, along with a prototype armoured suit, leads him to assume a new persona, one which will strike fear into the hearts of men who do wrong; he becomes Batman!!!(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Survivor. A set of coins plays into a gallery owner's murder, in which one of the suspects is the victim's wealthy friend(n)

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Double Blind. A university caretaker's murder begins a case that leads to a troubled student and the scientist who used him in drug research(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Deadbeat. A "deadbeat dad" is found murdered in a hotel room. The suspects include the victim's embittered father-in-law Max Schaffer (Val Avery) and two women in the dead man's life. Ultimately the prosecution of the case boils down to jury sympathy for a long-suffering and arguably justified perpetrator -- not to mention a terminal leukemia patient(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Family Business. The detectives investigate when Richard Spiegel, chief financial officer for an upscale family owned department store, is found murdered. As usual, the case is top-heavy with likely suspects. Eventually the field narrows to two women, the dead man's widow (Anne Twomey) and his possible mistress (Jean de Baer) -- both of whom are daughters of the store's owner Seymour Bergreen (Joseph Wiseman)(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Entrapment. Huey Tate (Chris McKinney) is arrested for the double murder of a black-activist congressman and his bodyguard. Subsequent investigation reveals that one of the victims may have been responsible for an innocent person's death. Crucial to the D.A.'s prosecution is the eyewitness testimony of a woman who is an informant for the FBI -- and as such, cannot be allowed to testify(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Legacy. What at first seems to be a random shooting is eventually revealed to be a deliberate murder attempt. Furthermore, the victim's wife had been previously wed to a man who died in an inadequately investigated accident. When the original case is re-opened, the detectives and the lawyers find themselves with overabundant evidence of a deadly and long-standing vendetta(n)

programme.title: Pacific Rim
programme.desc: Filmmaker Guillermo del Toro teams up with Legendary Pictures to bring audiences a unique take on the monster film with this sci-fi production. Charlie Hunnam (Sons of Anarchy) stars as a washed-out controller and pilot of a series of robots called Jaegers, which are put into production after Earth is invaded by a species of giant monsters, the Kaijus. The Brothers Bloom's Rinko Kikuchi co-stars as a trainee whom Hunnam is psychically paired with in order to pilot the last beacon of hope -- a decommissioned Jaeger assigned to stop the Kaijus once and for all. Thor's Idris Elba leads the rest of the starring cast, which includes Charlie Day, Rob Kazinsky and Ron Perlman(n)

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: As a young boy, Bruce Wayne watched in horror as his millionaire parents were slain in front of him--a trauma that leads him to become obsessed with revenge. But the opportunity to avenge his parents' deaths is cruelly taken away from him by fate. Fleeing to the East, where he seeks counsel with the dangerous but honourable ninja cult leader known as Ra's Al-Ghul, Bruce returns to his now decaying Gotham City, which is overrun by organised crime and other dangerous individuals manipulating the system. Meanwhile, Bruce is slowly being swindled out of Wayne Industries, the company he inherited. The discovery of a cave under his mansion, along with a prototype armoured suit, leads him to assume a new persona, one which will strike fear into the hearts of men who do wrong; he becomes Batman!!!(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Biopic of Chris Kyle, a celebrated sniper in the American military. In the aftermath of 9/11, Kyle decides to serve his country by becoming a Navy SEAL. But with each tour of duty, he grows more detached from his wife and children(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: D-Girl. In this opening episode of Law & Order's first (and thus far only) three-part story, a female Hollywood studio executive is found murdered -- and decapitated -- in New York City. Detectives Briscoe (Jerry Orbach) and Curtis (Benjamin Bratt) head to Tinseltown to check out the suspects, among them the dead woman's abusive ex-husband, Eddie Newman (Scott Cohen), and shady personal trainer Evan Grant (Jeffrey D. Sams). Meanwhile, assistant D.A.'s McCoy (Sam Waterston) and Ross (Carey Lowell) work overtime to make sure that Briscoe and Curtis are not overstepping their jurisdictional bounds(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Turnaround. Part 2 of three. As the case of the movie-studio president's killing continues, it appears that the wrong suspect has been arrested; and Ross must face her ex, who's the new suspect's defense attorney. Newman: Scott Cohen. Grant: Jeffrey D. Sams. Gorton: Keith Szarabajka(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Showtime. As the three-parter concludes, the suspect gets his day(s) in court, but several events serve to complicate matters. Among them: Gorton suing Ross for custody of their daughter. Gorton: Keith Szarabajka. Newman: Scott Cohen. Joyner: Franchelle Stewart Dorn(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Mad Dog. No sooner has serial rapist Lewis Darnell (Burt Young) been released on parole than a young woman is assaulted and murdered. Assistant D.A. McCoy (Sam Waterston) is determined to connect Darnell with this most recent outrage and to put him behind bars permanently. Unfortunately, McCoy's zeal leads to accusations of undue "strongarm" methods on the part of detectives Briscoe (Jerry Orbach) and Curtis (Benjamin Bratt)(n)

programme.title: Money Talks
programme.desc: Action and fast talking comedy abounds as motormouth Chris Tucker stars alongside Charlie Sheen as an escaped convict being chased by the police and a gang of diamond thieves. Franklin Hatchett is a small-time con man exposed by investigative reporter James Russell . When Hatchett becomes unwittingly involved in a jail break, the police think the escape was his idea. Not knowing where to hide, he calls the reporter and makes a deal: he will provide Russell with the exclusive story when he turns himself in, providing that Russell shelters him for the weekend. With a plan so simple, what could possibly go wrong?(n)
